creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: self-edged; blue lined; sash-shaped purse with zipper and two end ties; eight knotted and outlined embroidered floral medallions in reds, blues, white, green and orange, and bordered with gold cord on black fabric; 1/2" scroll border at bottom edge; small floral embroidery on sides and top edges
dimension:
60 1/2 x 5 in. (153.67 x 12.7 cm) (including ties)
18 1/2 in. (46.99 cm) (object part, two ties, each)
medium: Cotton, zipper, gold colored wrapped cord
title: Purse (or Sash?)
